scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cy_e2e: npm run prereport && npx cypress run
scripts.e2e_report: npm run cy_e2e; npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.cy_dashboard: npm run cy_spec -- --browser webkit --group Webkit --ci-build-id 1 & npm run cy_spec -- --browser chrome --group Chrome --ci-build-id 1
scripts.cy_browsers: npx cypress run --browser chrome & npx cypress run --browser webkit
